text: Torben Rehfeldt (born 7 August 1993) is a German professional footballer who plays as centre-back for SV Elversberg. ==Career== After joining Werder Bremen in July 2012, Rehfeldt initially played for the club's U-21 team. In the 2014–15 season he was promoted to the reserves playing in the 3. Liga. In May 2017, he signed a two-year contract with 3. Liga rivals VfR Aalen. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Holstein Kiel players Category:SV Werder Bremen II players Category:SV Werder Bremen players Category:VfR Aalen players Category:SV Elversberg players Category:Regionalliga players Category:3. title: Torben Rehfeldt
